settings.text: Enjoy the best bubble gum and chewing gum varieties from when you were a kid. Browse our massive selection to find classics or a new favorite!

From minty-fresh sticks after meals to bright pink gumballs that expand into
bubbles, gum is a timeless treat for all ages. Whether you’re a fan of new,
bold flavors, old chewing gum brands, or everything in between, we’ve got a
great selection of bubble gum and chewing gum for you to enjoy.

Enjoy the “Candy you ate as a Kid .”

settings.heading: Who Invented Bubble Gum?
settings.content:
The invention of the first successful bubble-blowing bubble gum is credited to Walter Dimer. While working as an accountant for Fleer Chewing Gum Company, the 23-year-old experimented with new gum recipes during his spare time. One day he accidentally made a formula that was less sticky and more flexible which made it easier to blow bubbles.

The company loved Dimer’s product and quickly began to market it as “Double Bubble.” It remained the only bubble gum on the market until Bazooka bubble gum was created after WWII.

Chewing gum, however, was already popular for quite some time before bubble gum was invented. For example, William Wrigley Jr. launched two gum brands, Juicy Fruit and Wrigley’s Spearmint, in 1928 after using them as promotions when he worked as a soap salesman. Whether you prefer chewing gum or bubble gum, you’re sure to be reminded of some great candy memories as you scroll through our selection!

settings.title: Christmas Gifts for Employees
settings.richtext:
The Christmas season is all about joy, goodwill, family, and faith. With staff gifts for christmas, you can express how much your team means to you during this holiday. Offering corporate Christmas gifts to clients and customers can also show your appreciation and goodwill.

If you are looking for employee Christmas gifts or client corporate Christmas gifts, a box of candy is the perfect sweet treat for the season.

settings.title: Thanksgiving Gifts for Employees
settings.richtext: Gratitude and generosity are central themes of the Thanksgiving holiday, so providing Employee thanksgiving gifts is a great way to engage your staff and express your appreciation. While everyone focuses on more savory items like turkey and gravy, you can send candy corporate Thanksgiving gifts to supply dessert – especially for anyone who doesn’t like pumpkin pie.

settings.title: Corporate Halloween Gifts
settings.richtext: Trick or treat! Candy team gifts are perfect for celebrating Halloween with your employees or clients. Since most working adults don’t wear costumes and go door to door (at least, not without little ones), you can offer sweet candy gifts for office staff as a sign of gratitude and motivation with seasonal flair. Nostalgic candy boxes from Old Time Candy make good employee gifts for all holidays, but especially Halloween!

settings.title: Employee Appreciation Easter Gifts for Employees
settings.richtext: Even though most teams don’t work on Easter, offering employee holiday gifts is a great way to encourage your team. With holiday corporate gifts from Old Time Candy, you can embellish your employees’ or clients’ Easter candy haul with classic and unique candy varieties.

settings.title: Valentine's Day Gifts for Employees
settings.richtext: While Valentine’s Day is often regarded as the romantic holiday, it is also a time of celebrating all relationships. Candy boxes make perfect Valentine gifts for office staff, with or without hand-crafted notes to accompany them. If you are looking for easy but thoughtful employee valentine gifts, candy corporate boxes are a great way to go!

settings.title: Employee Appreciation Day Gifts
settings.richtext:
Officially, Employee Appreciation Day occurs on the first Friday of March every year. You don’t have to wait for March to roll around again to express employee appreciation, but if you’re looking for employee appreciation day gifts ideas, ahead of time, it’s important to consider your options!

Corporate candy gifts are great for expressing your appreciation for your staff. They can be customized to suit your team’s preferences and interests, and at Old Time Candy, we can even personalize your boxes with your business’ logos and messaging.

settings.heading: Celebrate Every Season With Holiday Gifts for Employees
settings.content:
The holidays are a great time to show your employees how much you appreciate them. What better way to do this than with corporate holiday gifts from Old Time Candy? We have a wide selection of unique corporate gifts that are sure to put a smile on your employees' faces no matter what holiday you’re celebrating.

From Christmas candy gifts to Halloween candy gifts and everything in between, we have something for every holiday. We can even personalize our candy gift box tops, or you can choose from our pre-designed candy boxes.

Looking for holiday client gifts, too? We’ve got you covered! Let your customers know you’re thinking of them over the holidays with a thoughtful gift of delicious candy!

settings.title: Employee Appreciation Gifts During Covid
settings.richtext: If your office is fully remote or hybrid in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic, sending appreciation gifts for employees working from home can help make your whole workforce feel connected, united, and valued. Send them a box of candy to brighten their days and make them know how much you value them!

settings.title: Bubble Gum Ball
settings.richtext:
If you find yourself in the presence of a bubble gum machine, a quarter is a small price to pay for a round, delightful gum ball. You can even purchase your own gum ball machines in any size, from the large ones that populated arcades and movie theaters to mini machines perfect for desktops.

While bubble gum balls aren’t most people’s go-to chewing gum, they can be a fun and nostalgic treat.

settings.title: Bubble Gum Sugar Free
settings.richtext: Sugar free chewing gum is a great option for anyone with sensitive teeth or high blood sugar. If you’re trying to cut back on your sugar intake for any reason but don’t want to give up chewing gum, we hear you! Plenty of brands make sugar free gum for you to chew and enjoy without worrying about your health.

settings.title: Bubble Gum Cigars
settings.richtext: Shaped – and often wrapped – like the real thing, bubble gum cigars are a fun way to celebrate a special occasion or enjoy a big piece of gum, perfect for blowing bubbles.

settings.title: Bubble Gum Cigarettes
settings.richtext: Complete with a puff of sugar “smoke,” bubble gum cigarettes are paper-wrapped sticks of gum with an adult twist.

settings.heading: Other Types of Bubble Gum
settings.content: Bubble gum comes in a number of shapes and sizes. Mix up your chewing habits with some of these varieties.
